chess.domain.board

Class ChessBoardCopier

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.domain.board.ChessBoardCopier

  • public class ChessBoardCopier
extends Object
    This class is used to make copies of ChessBoards with method copy as well as make two chessboards deeply equal or undo a move by making its start point and end point equal to backup.
    Author:
    sami

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChessBoardCopier()
      Creates a new ChessBoardCopier-object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean chessBoardsAreDeeplyEqual(ChessBoard cb1, ChessBoard cb2)
      Checks if both chessboard have deeply equal pieces on same squares.
      static ChessBoard copy(ChessBoard board)
      Returns a new ChessBoard that deeply equals the one given as parameter.
      static void revertOldSituation(ChessBoard board, ChessBoard chessboard)
      This method is used to make first ChessBoard object given as parameter deeply equal to second one without creating new objects.
      static void undoMove(ChessBoard backUp, GameSituation sit, Square from, Square to)
      Offers a more effective way of reverting a single move instead of whole series of moves.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ChessBoardCopier

        public ChessBoardCopier()
        Creates a new ChessBoardCopier-object.

    • Method Detail

      • copy

        public static ChessBoard copy(ChessBoard board)
        Returns a new ChessBoard that deeply equals the one given as parameter.
        Parameters:
        board - chessboard to be copied.
        Returns:
        a deep copy of given ChessBoard.

      • revertOldSituation

        public static void revertOldSituation(ChessBoard board,
                                      ChessBoard chessboard)
        This method is used to make first ChessBoard object given as parameter deeply equal to second one without creating new objects. Thus this method changes each field in first board to be equal to second one's.
        Parameters:
        board - ChessBoard to be changed to deeply equal second one
        chessboard - ChessBoard to be 'copied'

      • undoMove

        public static void undoMove(ChessBoard backUp,
                            GameSituation sit,
                            Square from,
                            Square to)
        Offers a more effective way of reverting a single move instead of whole series of moves.
        Parameters:
        backUp - backup of situation before move was made.
        sit - game situation after move was made.
        from - square that moved piece moved from.
        to - square that moved piece moved to.

      • chessBoardsAreDeeplyEqual

        public static boolean chessBoardsAreDeeplyEqual(ChessBoard cb1,
                                                ChessBoard cb2)
        Checks if both chessboard have deeply equal pieces on same squares.
        Parameters:
        cb1 - first chessboard.
        cb2 - second chessboard.
        Returns:
        true if all squares contain deeply equal pieces.
